differences.change_description: Added 'Forgot Password' link without question mark
differences.details: Link text is 'Forgot Password' instead of 'Forgot Password?'

differences.change_description: Password field now has type='password' with eye icon
differences.details: Password input field shows dots and has visibility toggle icon

differences.change_description: Login button is green and Register button text changed to 'Sign Up'
differences.details: Login button has green background, Register button now says 'Sign Up'

differences.change_description: New header added with Home and About links, but About is not on extreme right
differences.details: Header exists with Home and About links, but About is positioned next to Home instead of far right

analysis.reasoning: Matches JIRA ticket UI-001 for 'Forgot Password?' but missing question mark
Exactly matches JIRA ticket UI-002 for password field changes
Register button changed to 'Sign Up' with no corresponding JIRA ticket
Header added per UI-004 but About link not positioned on extreme right as specified

analysis.overall_assessment: Found 1 minor issue and 2 critical regressions that need escalation
